org.apache.giraph.utils

类 IncreasingBitSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.utils.IncreasingBitSet

  • public class IncreasingBitSet
extends Object
    Bit set optimized for increasing longs to save storage space. The general idea is that even though some keys will be added out-of-order, there is a base key that keeps increasing so that the bit set doesn't get very big. When there are enough set bits, the bit set gets compacted. Thread-safe.

    • 字段概要

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      Minimum number of bits to shift
